words.def: a habitual or characteristic mental attitude that determines how you will interpret and respond to situations
a person employed to keep watch for some anticipated event
Japanese stringed instrument that resembles a zither
the feelings expressed on a person's face
A national folk dance common in regions pertaining to South Slavic  people, performed in a circle.
aromatic yellowish brown balsam from the tolu balsam tree used especially in cough syrups
an implement used in the practice of a vocation
(baseball) a failure by a batter or runner to reach a base safely in baseball
to a degree exceeding normal or proper limits
(often followed by `of') a large number or amount or extent
Toward a closed, touching or engaging position.
the local time at the 0 meridian passing through Greenwich, England
